job_tasks.phrase: collaborate to build new AI centric products in the learning space.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of building products, with an explicit mention of AI centricity, aligning with integrating AI features into applications.

job_tasks.phrase: work closely with more senior engineers who will mentor and guide them.
job_tasks.justification: This describes collaboration and learning within a software development context, fitting under general software engineering practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding business needs and translating them into technical guidance for product development.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding how new features (potentially AI-centric) affect existing software systems and teams, a core integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: Research, prototype, and select appropriate COTS and in-house technology and design
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of evaluating and choosing technologies for building software, a fundamental software engineering activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with team to design, develop, and occasionally enhance or maintain existing systems
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct description of traditional software development lifecycle tasks: design, development, enhancement, and maintenance.

job_tasks.phrase: Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards
job_tasks.justification: Documentation of software designs and implementations is a standard software engineering practice.

job_tasks.phrase: Create documentation including system and sequence diagrams
job_tasks.justification: Creating system and sequence diagrams are specific forms of software documentation and design representation.

job_tasks.phrase: Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions the application of generative AI, which can encompass prompt engineering and RAG for product features and productivity.

job_tasks.phrase: Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept
job_tasks.justification: Exploring new technologies and creating proofs-of-concept is part of the software development process to evaluate and adopt new tools or approaches.

job_tasks.phrase: Occasionally present research and work to socialize and share knowledge across the organization
job_tasks.justification: Presenting research and sharing knowledge is a form of communication and collaboration within an organization.

soft_skills.justification: The word 'collaborate' directly indicates teamwork and shared effort.

soft_skills.phrase: work closely with more senior engineers who will mentor and guide them.
soft_skills.justification: Working closely with others and receiving mentorship implies strong collaboration and communication.

soft_skills.phrase: Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features
soft_skills.justification: Interacting with product owners and curators to understand requirements is a key communication and collaboration activity.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams
soft_skills.justification: The term 'collaborate' explicitly points to this category.

soft_skills.phrase: Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards
soft_skills.justification: This is a software development task, but the 'ensure consistency and alignment with standards' implies communication of standards.

soft_skills.phrase: Occasionally present research and work to socialize and share knowledge across the organization
soft_skills.justification: Presenting and sharing knowledge are direct forms of communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.justification: Exploring new technologies and design patterns indicates a commitment to learning and adapting.

profile.rationale: The job ad emphasizes traditional software engineering tasks (design, develop, enhance, maintain systems, documentation, APIs, cloud services, databases) as the primary focus. While it mentions utilizing generative AI, LLMs, RAG, and Agents, these are presented as features to be integrated into products or used for productivity, rather than the core focus of model development or deep AI research. The role is predominantly 'Macro-Category A' with some 'Macro-Category B' elements, fitting the description of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines a software engineering role with AI integration. The tasks and technologies are well-defined, allowing for a confident classification. However, the 'AI centric products' and 'utilize and apply generative AI' could be interpreted slightly differently, leading to a minor reduction in absolute certainty compared to a purely software engineering role or a pure AI specialist role.
